feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 02:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: N 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
